body:
I'd wanted to make this for a while now, it was brought up to me by a friend.

Google Custom Search let's us search any keyword used in that website, in this case "Avicus Forums". 

So basically, whatever you search you will get multiple results for it. 

I thought it would be easier to navigate around the forums since, well it's basically like the google search engine but for Avicus Forums. 

People can use this to find old threads that they want to link in another thread to help or whatever. 

Boop.

I kind of hope this helps people! 
Cya guys in-game!
body_tagged:
